column1: Little Goat Diner////Made reservations with friends in advance to try this place I had heard great things about. Had a little trouble deciding between the Bahn Mi burger and the fish tostadas
column2: but I hadn't had tostadas since before I was in the womb
column3: so I decided right as I placed my order. The taste was pretty good
column4: a little bit heavy to my surprise
column5: but the flavor was quite unique: there was a nice balance of tang
column6: richness and crispness from the cilantro. Will be back to try the Bahn Mi burger!
